sourcesContent:
<template>
  <cus-wraper>

    <cus-page-title-back :isDialog="true" :label="$t('i18nView.feeControlCalcFormulaDef')" @backTo="back"/>

    <!-- 业务项信息 -->
    <el-form ref="productBnftForm" :disabled="true" label-width="130px">
      <el-row :gutter="10" type="flex">
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item v-if="!pdtempPdClmBnft.id" :label="$t('i18nView.guaranteeItem')">
            <el-tag type="info">{{ pdtempPdBnft.pdBnftCode + ':' + pdtempPdBnft.pdBnftName }}</el-tag>
          </el-form-item>
          <el-form-item v-if="pdtempPdClmBnft.id" :label="$t('i18nView.guaranteeDetails')">
            <el-tag type="info">{{ pdtempPdClmBnft.pdClmBnftCode + ':' + pdtempPdClmBnft.pdClmBnftName }}</el-tag>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('i18nView.payControlType')">
            <el-tag type="info">{{ pdtempClmCtrlMain.pdBnftCtrlType | filter_clmCtrlType }}</el-tag>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('i18nView.controlItemCode')">
            <el-tag type="info">{{ pdtempClmCtrlMain.pdBnftCtrlCode }}</el-tag>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
      </el-row>
      <el-row :gutter="10" type="flex">
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('i18nView.CalcFormulaType')">
            <el-tag type="info">{{ pdBussDetailType | filter_pdBussDetailType }}</el-tag>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
      </el-row>
    </el-form>

    <!-- 已选择公式 -->
    <cus-form-title :first="true" :label="$t('i18nView.selectControlFOrmula')"></cus-form-title>
    <cus-table-title :label="$t('i18nView.pdControlCalcFormula')"/>
    <el-table :data="tableData_current" border highlight-current-row size="mini">
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.select')" width="50">
        <template slot-scope="scope">
          <el-radio-group v-model="selectedFormula" @change="selectedFormulaChanged()">
            <el-radio :label="scope.row">{{ '' }}</el-radio>
          </el-radio-group>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.detail')" align="center"  width="100">
        <template slot-scope="scope">
          <el-button size="small" type="text" @click="showFormula(scope.row)">>></el-button>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('rule.pdBussDetailType')" align="center" min-width="200" prop="pdBussDetailType">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{ scope.row.pdBussDetailType | filter_pdBussDetailType }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('pdtempPdClmBnft.expressionCode')" align="center" min-width="200" prop="pdCalcCode">
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('pdtempPdClmBnft.expressionDesc')" align="center" min-width="200" prop="pdCalcDesc">
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column align="center" pdRuleDesc min-width="200">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{
            scope.row.ruleAttr === '1' ? $t('rule.general') : (scope.row.ruleAttr === '2' ? $t('rule.individual') : '')
          }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.actions')" align="center" fixed="right" width="120">
        <template slot-scope="scope">
          <cus-del-btn v-auth="'clmCtrlFormula:delete'" @ok="deleteFormula(scope.row)"></cus-del-btn>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
    </el-table>
    <cus-pagination ref="page_current" v-model="tableData_current" :autoBuild="false" :pageSize="5"
                    :params="params_current" url="/clmCtrlFormula/base/currentFormula"/>

    <!-- 可选择公式 -->
    <cus-form-title :first="true" :label="$t('i18nView.optionControlFormula')"></cus-form-title>

    <el-row style="text-align: right">
      <el-button icon="el-icon-connection" size="small" type="primary" @click="toFormulaSelect">
        {{$t('rule.moreFormula')}}
      </el-button>
      <el-button icon="el-icon-circle-plus el-icon--left" size="small" type="primary" @click="toAddFormula">
        {{$t('rule.toAddFormula')}}
      </el-button>
    </el-row>

    <cus-table-title :label="$t('i18nView.controlControlRule')"/>
    <el-table :data="tableData_brief" border highlight-current-row size="mini">
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.id')" align="center" width="50">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{ initTableIndex('page_brief', scope.$index) }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.detail')" align="center" width="100">
        <template slot-scope="scope">
          <el-button size="small" type="text" @click="showFormula(scope.row)">>></el-button>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :filter-method="filters_method" :filters="filters_pdCode" align="center" :label="$t('customComponents.product')"
                       min-width="200" prop="pdCode" sortable>
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{ scope.row.pdCode ? scope.row.pdCode + ':' + scope.row.pdName : '' }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column align="center" :label="$t('i18nView.guaranteeItem')" min-width="200" prop="pdBnftCode" sortable>
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{ scope.row.pdBnftCode ? scope.row.pdBnftCode + ':' + scope.row.pdBnftName : '' }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column align="center" :label="$t('i18nView.guaranteeDetails')" min-width="200" prop="pdBnftDTCode" sortable>
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{ scope.row.pdBnftDTCode ? scope.row.pdBnftDTCode + ':' + scope.row.pdBnftDTName : '' }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column align="center" :label="$t('i18nView.payControlType')" min-width="200" prop="pdBnftCtrlType" sortable>
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{ scope.row.pdBnftCtrlType | filter_clmCtrlType }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('i18nView.formulaDet')" align="center" min-width="200" prop="pdBussDetailType">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{ scope.row.pdBussDetailType | filter_pdBussDetailType }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('pdtempPdClmBnft.expressionCode')" align="center" min-width="200" prop="pdCalcCode">
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('pdtempPdClmBnft.expressionDesc')" align="center" min-width="200" prop="pdCalcDesc">
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column align="center" :label="$t('rule.ruleAttr')" min-width="200">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{
            scope.row.ruleAttr === '1' ? $t('rule.general') : (scope.row.ruleAttr === '2' ? $t('rule.individual') : '')
          }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.actions')" align="center" fixed="right" width="120">
        <template slot-scope="scope">
          <el-button v-auth="'clmCtrlFormulaSelect:associate'" icon="el-icon-connection"
                     size="mini" type="primary" @click="handleSelectFormula(scope.row)">
            {{$t('form.select')}}
          </el-button>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
    </el-table>
    <cus-pagination ref="page_brief" v-model="tableData_brief" :autoBuild="false" :pageSize="5"
                    :params="params_brief" url="/clmCtrlFormula/base/briefFormula"/>

    <!-- 规则引擎公式定义弹窗 -->
    <cus-rule-definition :attributeObj="attributeObj" :ruleDefinitionClosed="ruleModuleClosed"
                         :visible="formulaVisible"></cus-rule-definition>

    <!-- 公式查看和决策树编辑弹窗 -->
    <cus-rule-modify :flag="formulaView.flag" :performType="formulaView.performType" :ruleCode="formulaView.ruleCode"
                     :ruleModifyClosed="formulaViewClosed" :ruleType="'2'"
                     :visible="formulaView.visible"></cus-rule-modify>

  </cus-wraper>
</template>

<script>

import {deleteClmCtrlFormula} from "@/api/basicinfo/clmCtrlFormula"
import {associate, getCalcCode} from "@/api/basicinfo/clmCtrlFormulaSelect"

let _this

export default {
  name: 'clmCtrlFormula',
  props: {
    pdtempClmCtrlMain: {
      type: Object,
      required: true
    },
    pdBussDetailType: {
      type: String,
      required: true
    },
    pdtempPdBnft: {
      type: Object,
      required: false,
      default: () => {
        return {}
      }
    },
    pdtempPdClmBnft: {
      type: Object,
      required: false,
      default: () => {
        return {}
      }
    }
  },
  filters: {
    filter_pdBussDetailType(code) {
      return _this.getCodeName('ruleBusinessDetailClass', code)
    },
    filter_clmCtrlType(code) {
      return _this.getCodeName('clmCtrlType', code)
    }
  },
  data() {
    _this = this
    return {
      params_current: {
        product: undefined,
        pdBussType: '',
        pdBussDetailType: '',
        pdBussCode: ''
      },
      params_brief: {
        product: undefined,
        productDetailType: '',
        pdBussDetailType: this.pdBussDetailType,
        pdBussId: this.pdtempClmCtrlMain.id
      },
      filters_pdCode: [],
      tableData_current: [],
      tableData_brief: [],
      selectedFormula: {},
      attributeObj: {},
      formulaVisible: false,
      // 产品信息
      product: {
        id: undefined,
        bType: '',
        cType: '',
        pdCode: '',
        pdEdition: '',
        pdVerId: undefined,
        pdSalechnl: '',
        pdName: '',
        pdShortname: '',
        pdEnName: '',
        pdShortEnName: '',
        operator: '',
        pdApplDate: undefined,
        pdProcessId: undefined,
        createTime: undefined,
        updateTime: undefined
      },
      formulaView: {
        flag: '',
        ruleCode: '',
        performType: '',
        visible: false
      }
    }
  },
  watch: {
    tableData_brief() {
      this.filters_pdCode = []
      this.tableData_brief.forEach(val => {
        if (!this._.includes(this._.map(this.filters_pdCode, 'value'), val.pdCode)) {
          this.filters_pdCode.push({
            text: val.pdCode + ':' + val.pdName,
            value: val.pdCode
          })
        }
      })
    }
  },
  created() {
    this.initProductInfo()
    this.initTableData()
  },
  mounted() {
  },
  methods: {
    initTableData() {
      this.params_current.product = this.product
      this.params_current.pdBussType = '2'
      this.params_current.pdBussDetailType = this.pdBussDetailType
      this.params_current.pdBussCode = this.pdtempClmCtrlMain.pdBnftCtrlCode
      this.params_brief.product = this.product
      this.params_brief.productDetailType = this.product.cType
      this.$nextTick(() => {
        this.$refs.page_current.reload()
        this.$refs.page_brief.reload()
      })
    },
    showFormula(row) {
      this.formulaView.flag = '1'
      this.formulaView.performType = row.performType
      this.formulaView.ruleCode = row.pdCalcCode
      this.formulaView.visible = true
    },
    ruleModuleClosed() {
      this.formulaVisible = false
      this.$refs.page_brief.reload()
    },
    formulaViewClosed() {
      this.formulaView.visible = false
      this.selectedFormula = {}
    },
    initProductInfo() {
      let pdtempPdInfo = this.getPdData();
      if (Object.keys(pdtempPdInfo).length > 0) {
        Object.assign(this.product, pdtempPdInfo)
      } else {
        this.notifyError(this.$t('message.invalidProductInfo'))
      }
    },
    back() {
      this.$emit('changeDialogVisible_ClmCtrlFormula', false)
    },
    toFormulaSelect() {
      this.$emit('changeDialogVisible_ClmCtrlFormulaSelect', true, 'aaa')
    },
    toAddFormula() {
      const param = {
        pdBussType: '2',
        pdBussDetailType: this.pdBussDetailType
      }
      getCalcCode(this.buildRequestData(param)).then(response => {
        this.attributeObj = {
          code: response.data,
          ruleBussModu: '2',
          ruleBussModuDeta: this.pdBussDetailType,
          ruleType: '2',
          ruleAttr: '2',
          pdType: '1',
          riskType: this.product.bType,
          riskDetail: this.product.cType,
          pdCode: this.product.pdCode,
          pdEdition: this.product.pdEdition
        }
        this.formulaVisible = true
      })
    },
    selectedFormulaChanged() {
      this.formulaView.flag = this.selectedFormula.ruleAttr === '1' ? '1' : '2'
      this.formulaView.performType = this.selectedFormula.performType
      this.formulaView.ruleCode = this.selectedFormula.pdCalcCode
      this.formulaView.visible = true
    },
    deleteFormula(row) {
      const param = {
        pdtempPdCalcVo: row,
        pdtempClmCtrlMain: this.pdtempClmCtrlMain
      }
      deleteClmCtrlFormula(this.buildRequestData(param)).then(() => {
        this.notifySuccess(this.$t('successMessage.delete'))
        this.$refs.page_current.reload()
        this.$refs.page_brief.reload()
        this.$emit('bringInCalcCode', this.pdtempClmCtrlMain.id, '')
      })
    },
    handleSelectFormula(row) {
      let PdtempPdCalc = {
        pdInfoId: this.product.id,
        pdVerId: this.product.pdVerId,
        pdType: '',
        pdCode: this.product.pdCode,
        pdBussType: '2',
        pdBussDetailType: this.pdBussDetailType,
        pdBussId: this.pdtempClmCtrlMain.id,
        pdBussCode: this.pdtempClmCtrlMain.pdBnftCtrlCode,
        pdStructureType: this.pdtempPdClmBnft.id ? '12' : '18',
        pdCalcCode: row.pdCalcCode,
        pdCalcDesc: row.pdCalcDesc
      }
      const param = {
        selectedFormula: row,
        pdtempPdCalc: PdtempPdCalc,
        product: this.product,
        pdBussType: '2',
        pdBussDetailType: this.pdBussDetailType,
        needChecking: true
      }
      associate(this.buildRequestData(param)).then(response => {
        let successFlag = response.data.flag
        let pdtempPdCalc = response.data.pdtempPdCalc
        if (successFlag === true) {
          this.notifySuccess(this.$t('rule.associationSuccess'))
          this.$refs.page_current.reload()
          this.$refs.page_brief.reload()
          this.$emit('bringInCalcCode', this.pdtempClmCtrlMain.id, pdtempPdCalc.pdCalcCode)
        } else {
          this.$confirm(String(this.$t('underwritingAmountFormulaSelect.confirm_overwrite_formula')), String(this.$t('confirmMessage.tip')), {
            confirmButtonText: String(this.$t('confirmMessage.confirm')),
            cancelButtonText: String(this.$t('confirmMessage.cancel')),
            type: 'warning'
          }).then(() => {
            param.needChecking = false
            associate(this.buildRequestData(param)).then(response => {
              let pdtempPdCalc = response.data.pdtempPdCalc
              this.notifySuccess(this.$t('rule.associationSuccess'))
              this.$refs.page_current.reload()
              this.$refs.page_brief.reload()
              this.$emit('bringInCalcCode', this.pdtempClmCtrlMain.id, pdtempPdCalc.pdCalcCode)
            })
          }).catch(() => {
            this.messageInfo(this.$t('underwritingAmountFormulaSelect.canceled'))
          })
        }
      })
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>

</style>
